name: Afrimium
description: Discover more about Africa in a simplified way with Afrimium History App.  Afrimium is a compilation of African History,world history, black inventors & achievement,interesting facts , proverbs and quotes from the heart of Africa. Afrimium is a mini-platform for discovering more about Africa ,our history and our future and disseminating ideas about how to solve the challenges we have in Africa.   Features  * Find Simplified History of Africa * Explore African History,World History,etc * Organized Ancient History * Concise knowledge about Africa. * Black achievers and inventors. * Inspirational Quotes and over 600 Proverbs * 400 + facts about Africa * Readers digest * Get top news,sports,history to read * Useful Resources about Africa * Offline and online support * Country by country search * Historical Timelines  Afrimium helps you to stay abreast with general knowledge about the African continent.
